SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class GenModelBenchmarking

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenModel
uk.msci.project.rsa.GenModelBenchmarking
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenModelComparisonBenchmarking
public class GenModelBenchmarking extends GenModel
This class, extending GenModel, is specifically designed for RSA key generation in benchmarking mode. It facilitates the batch generation of RSA keys, supporting performance analysis and comparisons between different key configurations and parameters. It is limited to standard benchmarking scenarios and does not support comparison benchmarking, presenting results for multiple key configurations side-by-side.

  • Constructor Details

    • GenModelBenchmarking

      public GenModelBenchmarking()
      Constructor for GenModel. This initialises the model which will be bound to the runtime behavior of the signature program. At the point of launch, the model does not have any state until it is initiated by the user.

  • Method Details

    • batchGenerateKeys

      public void batchGenerateKeys(int numTrials, List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> keyParams, DoubleConsumer progressUpdater)
      Generates keys in batches based on the given number of trials and key parameters. It uses a thread pool to parallelize key generation and keeps track of execution times.
      Parameters:
      numTrials - Number of trials to perform for key generation.
      keyParams - List of pairs containing key parameters and a boolean indicating if small exponent is used.
      progressUpdater - Consumer to update progress information.

    • getClockTimesPerTrial

      public List<Long> getClockTimesPerTrial()
      Gets the list of clock times for each trial during batch key generation.
      Returns:
      List of Long values representing the clock times for each trial.

    • generateKeyBatch

      public boolean generateKeyBatch()
      Generates a batch of keys based on the previously set key parameters.
      Returns:
      true if all keys in the batch are provably secure, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if key parameters are not set.

    • exportPublicKeyBatch

      public void exportPublicKeyBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the public keys from the generated key pairs to a batch file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error during the export process.

    • exportPrivateKeyBatch

      public void exportPrivateKeyBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the private keys from the generated key pairs to a batch file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error during the export process.

    • getKeyParams

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> getKeyParams()
      Gets the list of key parameters for batch key generation trials.
      Returns:
      List of Pair objects, each containing an int array representing key sizes and a boolean flag indicating whether to use a smaller 'e' value.

    • getPrivateKeyBatch

      public String getPrivateKeyBatch()
      Retrieves the batch of private keys generated for use in benchmarking mode.
      Returns:
      A String representing the batch of private keys.

    • getPublicKeyBatch

      public String getPublicKeyBatch()
      Retrieves the batch of public keys generated for use in benchmarking mode. The public keys are used in signature verification processes.
      Returns:
      A String representing the batch of public keys.

    • summedKeySizes

      public List<Integer> summedKeySizes(List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> pairs)
      Sums the key sizes for each configuration within a provided list of key parameter pairs.
      Parameters:
      pairs - A List of Pair objects representing key configurations.
      Returns:
      A List of Integer values representing the total key sizes for each configuration.

    • formatCustomKeyConfigurations

      public List<String> formatCustomKeyConfigurations(List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> keyConfigurationsData)
      Formats custom key configurations into a human-readable string format. This method is not supported in the standard benchmarking mode, as custom key configurations are specific to the comparison benchmarking mode.
      Parameters:
      keyConfigurationsData - The list of key configurations data to format.
      Returns:
      A list of formatted string representations of the key configurations.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If called in standard benchmarking mode.

    • formatDefaultKeyConfigurations

      public List<String> formatDefaultKeyConfigurations()
      Formats default key configurations for comparison mode into a human-readable string format. This method is not supported in the standard benchmarking mode, as default key configurations are exclusive to comparison benchmarking mode.
      Returns:
      A list of formatted string representations of the default key configurations.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If called in standard benchmarking mode.

    • getNumKeySizesForComparisonMode

      public int getNumKeySizesForComparisonMode()
      Retrieves the number of different key sizes used in comparison benchmarking mode. This method is not applicable in the standard benchmarking mode and is exclusive to comparison benchmarking mode.
      Returns:
      The number of different key sizes used in comparison benchmarking mode.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If called in standard benchmarking mode.

    • getDefaultKeyConfigurationsData

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<int[],Boolean>> getDefaultKeyConfigurationsData()
      Generates a default set of key configurations for comparison mode. This method is not supported in the standard benchmarking mode, as it pertains exclusively to comparison benchmarking mode where predefined configurations are used for comparison.
      Returns:
      A list of pairs, each containing an array of integers (representing fractions of key sizes) and a boolean (indicating small e selection).
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If called in standard benchmarking mode.
